summary: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.
cast: Nora Gregor|Paulette Dubost|Mila Parély|Odette Talazac|Claire Gérard|Anne Mayen|Lise Elina|Marcel Dalio|Julien Carette|Roland Toutain|Gaston Modot|Jean Renoir|Pierre Magnier|Eddy Debray|Pierre Nay|Richard Francoeur|Léon Larive|Nicolas Amato|Jacques Beauvais|Henri Cartier-Bresson|Celestin|Tony Corteggiani|Geo Forster|Roger Forster|Camille François|Jenny Hélia|Maurice Marceau|Marcel Melrac|André Zwoboda
title: La regla del juego
